src:
Bertemu Ketum PSSI, Semangat Timnas Indonesia U-23 Berlipat Ganda
06 Nov 2019, 18:24 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Skuat Timnas Indonesia U-23 berjumpa dengan Ketua Umum (Ketum) PSSI, Mochamad Iriawan di Hotel Sultan, Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019). Seusai pertemuan tersebut, semangat skuat Garuda Muda berlipat ganda untuk mengarungi SEA Games 2019.
Timnas Indonesia U-23 terus melakukan persiapan sebelum tampil di SEA Games 2019. Mengadakan pemusatan latihan (TC) selama berbulan-bulan, Garuda Muda mengemban target tinggi di perhelatan dua tahunan tersebut.
"Saya berterima kasih kepada beliau. Beliau berikan kami semangat," ujar pelatih Timnas Indonesia U-23, Indra Sjafri.
"Kita fokus ke latihan dan segala di luar teknis, beliau dukung 100 persen," katanya menambahkan.
Di SEA Games 2019, Timnas Indonesia U-23 tergabung di Grup B. Egy Maulana Vikri dan kawan-kawan akan menghadapi Thailand, Vietnam, Laos, Singapura, dan Brunei Darussalam.

text:
Meeting with the Chairman of PSSI, the spirit of the Indonesian U-23 national team doubled
Nov 6 2019, 18:24 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesia U-23 national team squad met with PSSI General Chairman (Ketum), Mochamad Iriawan at the Sultan Hotel, Jakarta, Wednesday (11/06/2019). After the meeting, the spirit of the Garuda Youth squad doubled to sail the 2019 SEA Games.
Indonesian U-23 national team continues to make preparations before appearing at the 2019 SEA Games. Carrying out training camps (TC) for months, Garuda Muda has a high target at the biennial event.
"I thank him. He gave us enthusiasm," said the Indonesian U-23 national team coach, Indra Sjafri.
"We focus on training and everything beyond technicality, he supports 100 percent," he added.
At the 2019 SEA Games, the Indonesia U-23 national team was incorporated in Group B. Egy Maulana Vikri and friends will face Thailand, Vietnam, Laos, Singapore and Brunei Darussalam.
